N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 540.4 - Escorted furlough

State Regulations
(a) Escorted
furlough may not be granted to a person who is subject to a temporary order of
observation or an order of commitment. (b) Escorted furlough may be granted by the
clinical director to a patient who is currently subject to an order of
retention, after consultation with the hospital forensic committee as required
by section
540.9
of this Part, and notice in
compliance with the procedures described in section
540.10
of this Part. (c) Escorted furlough may be granted by the
clinical director to a patient retained as a civil patient after the expiration
of an order issued under article 730 of the Criminal Procedure Law, after
consultation with the hospital forensic committee as required in section
540.9
of this Part and compliance
with the notice requirements described in section
540.10
of this Part. Notes
